languages.text: {n}Высокий иссохший старик гордо взирает на вас немигающими мутно-белесыми глазами. Обвисшая кожа свободно колышется при каждом его движении — словно плоть {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигатора{/g} откреплена от его костей. Вместо носа посреди лица регента зияет непроглядная дыра, а лысый череп покрывают шипастые наросты.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Высокий иссохший старик гордо взирает на вас немигающими мутно-белесыми глазами. Обвисшая кожа свободно колышется при каждом его движении — словно плоть {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигатора{/g} откреплена от его костей. Вместо носа посреди лица регента зияет непроглядная дыра, а лысый череп покрывают шипастые наросты.{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}A tall, wizened old man proudly stares at you with milky, unblinking eyes. Loose skin sways with his every move, as if the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s flesh has detached from his bones. An unsightly hole mars the regent's face where his nose should be, and the old man's skull is covered with spiky growths.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Высокий иссохший старик гордо взирает на вас немигающими мутно-белесыми глазами. Обвисшая кожа свободно колышется при каждом его движении — словно плоть {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигатора{/g} откреплена от его костей. Вместо носа посреди лица регента зияет непроглядная дыра, а лысый череп покрывают шипастые наросты.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A tall, wizened old man is proudly glaring at you with milky unblinking eyes. Loose skin is swaying with every his move as if the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigator's{/g} flesh was detached from his bones. An unsightly hole is marring the regent's face where his nose should be, and the greybeard's skull is covered with spiky growths.{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

An unsightly hole mars the regent's face where his nose should be, and the old man's skull is covered with spiky growths.{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}一位高大、枯瘦的老人高傲地用乳白色的双眼看着你，眼睛一眨不眨。他浑身松弛的皮肤随着他的动作抖动着，仿佛这位{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}的骨头已经挂不住肉了。这个老人脸上原本应该是鼻子的地方，变成了一个难看的洞，他的头上长满了尖尖的骨刺。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A tall, wizened old man proudly stares at you with milky, unblinking eyes. Loose skin sways with his every move, as if the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s flesh has detached from his bones. An unsightly hole mars the regent's face where his nose should be, and the old man's skull is covered with spiky growths.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一位高大、枯瘦的老人高傲地用乳白色的双眼看着你，眼睛一眨不眨。他浑身松弛的皮肤随着他的动作抖动着，仿佛这位{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}的骨头已经挂不住肉了。这个老人脸上原本应该是鼻子的地方，变成了一个难看的洞，他的头上长满了尖尖的骨刺。{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}Un hombre alto y ajado te mira orgulloso con ojos lechosos. Su piel, suelta, se balancea con cada movimiento como si la carne del {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegante{/g} se hubiera separado de sus huesos. Un espantoso agujero ocupa el lugar donde debería estar su nariz, mientras que numerosas protuberancias espinosas sobresalen de su cráneo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A tall, wizened old man proudly stares at you with milky, unblinking eyes. Loose skin sways with his every move, as if the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s flesh has detached from his bones. An unsightly hole mars the regent's face where his nose should be, and the old man's skull is covered with spiky growths.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un hombre alto y ajado te mira orgulloso con ojos lechosos. Su piel, suelta, se balancea con cada movimiento como si la carne del {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegante{/g} se hubiera separado de sus huesos. Un espantoso agujero ocupa el lugar donde debería estar su nariz, mientras que numerosas protuberancias espinosas sobresalen de su cráneo.{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}長身の老人が、乳白色の瞬きのない目で誇らしげにあなたを見つめている。まるで{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}の肉が骨から剥がれ落ちたかのように、動くたびに緩んだ皮膚が揺れる。摂政の顔には鼻があるべきところに醜い穴が開き、頭蓋骨はトゲの生えたなにかで覆われていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A tall, wizened old man proudly stares at you with milky, unblinking eyes. Loose skin sways with his every move, as if the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s flesh has detached from his bones. An unsightly hole mars the regent's face where his nose should be, and the old man's skull is covered with spiky growths.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}長身の老人が、乳白色の瞬きのない目で誇らしげにあなたを見つめている。まるで{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}の肉が骨から剥がれ落ちたかのように、動くたびに緩んだ皮膚が揺れる。摂政の顔には鼻があるべきところに醜い穴が開き、頭蓋骨はトゲの生えたなにかで覆われていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}Ein großer, schrumpeliger alter Mann starrt dich stolz mit trüben, unbewegten Augen an. Seine Haut flattert lose bei jeder Bewegung, als hätte sich das Fleisch des {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g} von den Knochen gelöst. Ein unschönes Loch verunstaltet das Gesicht des Regenten an der Stelle, wo seine Nase sein sollte, und der Schädel des alten Mannes ist bedeckt mit stachligen Auswüchsen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A tall, wizened old man proudly stares at you with milky, unblinking eyes. Loose skin sways with his every move, as if the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s flesh has detached from his bones. An unsightly hole mars the regent's face where his nose should be, and the old man's skull is covered with spiky growths.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein großer, schrumpeliger alter Mann starrt dich stolz mit trüben, unbewegten Augen an. Seine Haut flattert lose bei jeder Bewegung, als hätte sich das Fleisch des {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g} von den Knochen gelöst. Ein unschönes Loch verunstaltet das Gesicht des Regenten an der Stelle, wo seine Nase sein sollte, und der Schädel des alten Mannes ist bedeckt mit stachligen Auswüchsen.{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}Un vieil homme desséché vous toise de toute sa hauteur, malgré ses yeux laiteux. À chacun de ses mouvements, sa peau semble se balancer, comme si la chair du {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g} s'était détachée de ses os. Un trou disgracieux lui tient place de nez, et son crâne est recouvert de protubérances pointues.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A tall, wizened old man proudly stares at you with milky, unblinking eyes. Loose skin sways with his every move, as if the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s flesh has detached from his bones. An unsightly hole mars the regent's face where his nose should be, and the old man's skull is covered with spiky growths.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un vieil homme desséché vous toise de toute sa hauteur, malgré ses yeux laiteux. À chacun de ses mouvements, sa peau semble se balancer, comme si la chair du {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g} s'était détachée de ses os. Un trou disgracieux lui tient place de nez, et son crâne est recouvert de protubérances pointues.{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}Uzun boylu, cildi kırış kırış, ihtiyar bir adam; süt beyazı gözlerini kırpmadan sana bakıyor. {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g} hareket ettikçe gevşek derisi, sanki eti kemiklerinden tamamen ayrıymış gibi sallanıyor. İhtiyar naibin burnunun olması gereken yerde iç kaldırıcı bir boşluk var, kafasıysa sivri oluşumlarla kaplı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A tall, wizened old man proudly stares at you with milky, unblinking eyes.
